name: SpaceHole2018
description:
Space Hole 2018 

Photosensitivity Warning: This game features many flashing lights and rapidly changing colors.
Space Hole 2018 is a psychedelic platformer starring a space shuttle exploring space...

Fly freely, or roll in the space ball. Some holes are for balls only...

Find Space Gems and upgrades in the exciting & esoteric cosmos...

A game by Sam Atlas
Music by dl Salo
Courtesy of Object Sonore
